amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike funds for project 99-D-143, a mixed oxide fuel fabrication facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike funds for project 99-D-143, mixed oxide fuel fabrication facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A026) Failed by voice vote.
